artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates.  Medium blue, green & teal, & olive warp. Green, blue, teal, metallic green weft. Addition of lt. teal after 2.5."   Machine edged top and bottom.  Stapled to 8.5 x 1" card.  "H-8B,  LAPIS HAND WOVEN" written on card.
title: Lapis Development Sample
